title: EXCLUSIVE: Facebook to shield users from EU data law
text:
EXCLUSIVE: Facebook to shield users from EU data law   01:55 
Facebook is about to change its Terms of Service for 1.5 billion international users to move their jurisdiction out of Ireland and to the U.S. ahead of the launch of a strict new data protection law by the European Union. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Facebook is about to change its Terms of Service for 1.5 billion international users to move their jurisdiction out of Ireland and to the U.S. ahead of the launch of a strict new data protection law by the European Union. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2Hfq6JF
